attributes.action: Slow the spread of Covid19. In shops, no mask / visor, no entry. No exceptions.
attributes.additional_details: This is an esay step to take that has the potential to have a huge impact. The virus is rising and a small minority are not cooperating, are putting everyone else at risk and are doing so freely at a time when the NHS is stretched to the limit.
attributes.background: To help bring down transmission rates of Covid19, even more urgent with a new version of the virus on the rise, take a reasonable step to require everyone to do their bit in helping the whole community to stay safer.

rejection.details:
People are already required to wear face masks in shops, unless exempt. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/face-coverings-when-to-wear-one-and-how-to-make-your-own/face-coverings-when-to-wear-one-and-how-to-make-your-own

You may wish to sign these petitions:

Require people exempt from wearing face coverings to wear a face shield: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555541

Make it illegal for businesses to challenge those not wearing face coverings: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555177
